title: At N.Y.U., a Hard Course, Student Complaints and a Fired Professor
abstract: Organic chemistry students said the class was too hard and organized a petition that led to the firing. Also: Judaism; mental health; Russian annexation.

title: Lights Out, America! (Songbirds Are Counting on Us.)
abstract: Up to a billion birds die in window strikes every year. The best way to make the migration seasons safer overall is also the easiest.

abstract: Two brothers from the Boston suburbs set out on an improbable journey to Montreal’s Expo 67 by hoof.
